description: Bandwidth Profile parameters. Properties that are not specified must be derivable from the Product that is being ordered, or by a Contract or Implementation Agreement between the Buyer and the Seller.
title: bandwidthProfile

___excessBurstSize.description: If specified, limits the maximum number of bytes available for a burst of Service or ENNI Frames sent at the EI speed to remain EIR-conformant.

$eref.description: A quantity to be used for specifying information rates.
$eref.title: informationRateQuantity

___units.description: The unit of measure for the quantity.

___amount.description: A quantity of something. Typically size, value, extent, or money.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, bandwidthProfile.

___committedInformationRate.description: Defines the average rate in bits/s of Service or ENNI Frames up to which the network may deliver Service or Network Frames but without any performance objectives.

___committedBurstSize.description: Limits the maximum number of bytes available for a burst of Service or ENNI Frames sent at the EI speed to remain CIR- onformant. MUST be >= 12176.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, bandwidthProfile.

$eref.description: A quantity to be used for specifying information rates.
$eref.title: informationRateQuantity

___units.description: The unit of measure for the quantity.

___amount.description: A quantity of something. Typically size, value, extent, or money.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, bandwidthProfile.

___excessInformationRate.description: If specified, defines the average rate in bits/s of Service or ENNI Frames up to which the network may deliver Service or Network Frames but without any performance objectives.

___colorMode.description: Color Mode parameter indicates whether the color-aware or color-blind property is employed by the Bandwidth Profile.

___couplingFlag.description: The Coupling Flag allows the choice between two modes of operation of the Bandwidth Profile algorithm.
